body.name: Purelis Handmade Soap Bars Gift Set. 6 Pc Natural Soap Set. Artisan Crafted Soap Bars with Essential Oils. Soap Gift Set for Women - Bath & Body Gift for Her!
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 10 hrs 28 mins
features: HANDMADE - Lovingly handmade in small batches the old fashioned way! Natural Ingredients combined with pure essential oils form our base of one of the gentlest and moisturizing of all soaps.

SKIN LOVING – Purelis Naturals luxurious floral soap gift set for women of skin nourishing soap bars. Including Lavender & Aloe, Vanilla & Shea Butter, Rosemary & Tea Tree, Pink Peony & Argan Oil, Dead Sea Mud and Papaya & Mango.

PREMIUM SENSITIVE SOAP BARS - Our updated formula does not contain any harmful chemicals or Propylene Glycol which may irritate the skin. Our Delicate Soap Cleanser & Soothing Skin Moisturizer is perfect for All Skin Types (Including Dry or Sensitive Skin). Dermatologist #1 Choice!

MEGA VALUE PACK - Packing contains 6 bars. Perfect Body & Face bar - Lather up & feel Amazing with our chemical free skin care. Great For Shaving Soap, exfoliating, acne, eczema, rashes, breakouts, ringworm, travel, and more... Each full sized bar measures 7.2CM x 5.2CM x 2.5CM and weighs 4OZ.

100% BATH LOVERS DELIGHT - We're sure you'll adore these Soap Bars, but in case of any issues, contact us, & we will do everything we can to make it right! Spoil the one you love most, to earth's best bath and body treats!
body.description: Simply the Best for your Skin! Purelis Soap Bars provide the perfect foundation for maintaining healthy glowing skin With the Purelis Soap Bar Set, the best way to treat a loved one and make them feel refreshed and revitalized! Unlike many other soap brands, we chose to make ours the old fashioned way. A time consuming labor of love that’s completely worth it because it gives us total control over what ingredients are used. These big bars are universally beloved making them the most appreciated gift for men, husband, women & kids, from friends & family to co-workers & anyone you want to give a gift they will remember! Great Foamy Lather 6 Unique Fresh Scents Paraben & SLS Free Not tested on Animals

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ingredients: Palm Oil, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Sucrose, Shea Butter, Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Purified Water and Essential Oils. The Power of the Shower The ultimate showering experience is dependent on the the kind of soap we use Give your loved ones the opportunity to express themselves and indulge with this most nourishing and skin loving soap collection! YOU'LL NEVER WANT TO USE A DIFFERENT SOAP AGAIN! Simply the Best for your Skin! Purelis Soap Bars provide the perfect foundation for maintaining healthy glowing skin With the Purelis Soap Bar Set, the best way to treat a loved one and make them feel refreshed and revitalized! Unlike many other soap brands, we chose to make ours the old fashioned way. A time consuming labor of love that’s completely worth it because it gives us total control over what ingredients are used. These big bars are universally beloved making them the most appreciated gift for men, husband, women & kids, from friends & family to co-workers & anyone you want to give a gift they will remember! Great Foamy Lather 6 Unique Fresh Scents Paraben & SLS Free Not tested on Animals

6 Irresistible Flavors: Pink Peony & Argan Oil High in essential fatty acids, Vitamin A and Vitamin E which promote healthy skin, promote collagen and elastin levels and regenerates skin cells Papaya & Mango Contains enzyme papain that helps fade the dark spots, induces skin fairness and removes blemishes. Vanilla & Shea Butter Helps alleviate eczema, soothes sunburn, minimizes stretch marks, long lasting moisturizer, rich in vitamin E, A, and F. Helps to soothe and calm irritated skin.

Rosemary & Tea Tree The anti-inflammatory properties of make it useful in relieving the discomfort of itchy skin. It soothes the skin and can also help heal infections that cause itchy skin. Lavender & Aloe Dead Sea Mud Includes salt and magnesium in it can improve your skin's functionality by making it a better barrier and more elastic.
If you don't love our soap as much as we do, we'll be happy to provide you with a full refund. So go ahead & "Lather in the Love!"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this soap
reviews.reviewText: My 63 year old skin was beginning to show its age. These soaps have made my skin soft and smooth again. Love all of them so much! Especially the lavender and dead sea mud!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Got them as a gift...
reviews.reviewText: ...for my daughter. the only one she liked was the lavender so she gave the others to my son's girlfriend who did like them but also wanted the lavender scented bar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the fresh feeling great smelling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I only use all natural soaps so I tried these. It lathers well and the scents are great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The bar of soap is great. What’s not great is the packaging. I have to keep a utility blade with the box to open the individual soaps. The packaging is too hard to open without it. Normally I do not have these types of issues opening other bars of soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I won't go back to liquid soap
reviews.reviewText: 10/10. This brand is pretty good. I wanted to stop using so much plastic with liquid soap. I was skeptical because dial and dawn leave a slimy greasy feeling on your skin afterwards. These don't do do that, smell greasy, smell lingers. Only thing is soap residue will build up on the shower floor a little bit, I mean but just wash your shower regularly and Scrub a little.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice alternative to your everyday dry soaps
reviews.reviewText: I’m no expert on natural soaps. Thought I’d change it up and stick to more natural ingredients to clean my skin and not take off the under layer of my epidermis with other industrial, deodorant type of soaps with oils that overpower any sort of perfume or cologne that you may put on afterwards.It does the job, cleans your skin, nice and gentle on your skin that has a with soft, pleasant natural smell that doesn’t dry you out.
